mapper.sql: timestamp_one, timestamp_two, timestamp_three, timestamp_four, timestamp_five, timestamp_six
mapper.insert: insert into timestamp_table (timestamp_one, timestamp_two, timestamp_three, timestamp_four, timestamp_five, timestamp_six) values (#{timestampOne}, #{timestampTwo}, #{timestampThree}, #{timestampFour}, #{timestampFive}, #{timestampSix})
mapper.select: select timestamp_one, timestamp_two, timestamp_three, timestamp_four, timestamp_five, timestamp_six from timestamp_table where id = #{id}
